name: Sewer Adventures (Mago)
description:
A friend of yours heard of a legend that the city's sewers were the home of many dangerous creatures that had taken the lives of many.  You did not believe him, but then your friend said he knew of the location of said sewers.  Your friend stops at the entrance, out of fright, but you decided to prove your friend that those were just dumb legends made by the other kids in the neighborhood... right?

Controls:

Use Left & Right Arrow Keys to move. 

Use Space bar to jump.

Use the Up Arrow Key to use the bonfires. They heal you and are check-points.

Use the Down Arrow Key to crouch.

Use Z to Dash to the LEFT and X to Dash to the RIGHT.

Credits:

Game Design:  Jean Paul Salman & Manuel Govea

Code:  Manuel Govea

Music: Manuel Govea

Story & Art: Jean Paul Salman
